ComicInfo.Title: Dawn of the Arashikage Part Two
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Dawn of the Arashikage Part Two: Dawn continues to live out memories of the original Snake-Eyes, recalling one of his Joe missions as she hunts the Red Ninjas through Tokyo. Storm Shadow informs the other Joes about what's happened to Dawn and the other Snake-Eyes - Sean - joins the assembled party.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-07 13:33:58. [CVDB652350] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:38:03. [Issue ID 1776232]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: John Royle,Miguel Mercado,Milen Parvanov,Netho Diaz,S.L. Gallant
ComicInfo.Characters: Sgt. Imai,Rock and Roll (flashback),Stalker,Scarlett,G.I.
